original_title: ROH: The Battle Lines Are Drawn
overview: The Battle Line are Drawn was a wrestling event held by Ring of Honor. It took place on January 10, 2004 at the Roberts Center in Wilmington, Ohio. The show was named after itâ€™s main event, as The Prophecy and the Second City Saints faced off in their fist match against each other.
title: ROH: The Battle Lines Are Drawn
